class.name: MeshInstance2D
class.brief_description: Node used for displaying a [Mesh] in 2D.
class.description: Node used for displaying a [Mesh] in 2D. A [MeshInstance2D] can be automatically created from an existing [Sprite2D] via a tool in the editor toolbar. Select the [Sprite2D] node, then choose [b]Sprite2D > Convert to MeshInstance2D[/b] at the top of the 2D editor viewport. [b]Note:[/b] Per-surface materials are not supported in [MeshInstance2D]. Instead, only the texture specified in [member texture] or the [CanvasItem] shader associated with the [MeshInstance2D] node will be used to render the mesh.

members.member: The [Mesh] that will be drawn by the [MeshInstance2D].
The [Texture2D] that will be used if using the default [CanvasItemMaterial]. Can be accessed as [code]TEXTURE[/code] in CanvasItem shader.

signal.name: texture_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the [member texture] is changed.
